Name: Mr. Sweet
About the game: RUN, JUMP, RUN, eat candy and go on again! Mr. Sweet is a game about running, jumping and endless distances! Break all the known records of the planet, the galaxy and the universe! Collect 'sweetcoins', candys and bonuses Open new characters, soundtracks and levels Overcome the increasingly complex obstacles Use your superpowers Become the best of the best! Have some fun!
